# PART 1: Select your Dataset 
## Load dataset
```{r}
crypto <- read.csv("/Users/abidikshit/R_Projects/Data/crypto.csv", header = T)
cat("Number of Rows before cleanup:", nrow(crypto), "\n") # Printing string and variable row count on the same line
cat("Number of Columns before cleanup:", ncol(crypto), "\n") 
cat("Blank cells count before cleanup:", sum(!complete.cases(crypto))) # Displaying Blank Cells Count for uncleaned data
```

## Convert date column to Date format
```{r}
crypto$Date <- as.Date(crypto$Date)
```

```{r}
headTail(crypto, top = 4, bottom = 4, ellipsis = F)
```

```{r}
summary(crypto)
```
